channel.title: TestScape/Pimpscape
channel.description: What are the key differences between TestScape nad PimpScape as far as making commands,menus,spawning npcs,makings shops, and making them talk. Or are there no differences? and does regular pimpscape come with pass encytption like testscape?

item.title: TestScape/Pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

They are similar. Pimpscape if you enjoy PKing servers more, Testscape is the oppisite. What I mean is it’s much easier to create a good PKing server from Pimpscape than it is Testscape.

It’s just as hard to create commands and menus, spawning npc’s etc. It’s all of the same level of difficulty. I also think Pimpscape comes with password encryption, yes. There’s a tut on removing that though, somewhere around the 5-10 pages in the tutorial section I would say.

Read full topic
